verbose_text: To rule out the possibility that the different effects of the Src alleles on cell size and dFOXO localization are a consequence of transgene expression levels rather than kinase activity or specificity, we expressed the four Src transgenes used in this study with a fatbody specific driver line (cg-Gal4) XREF_BIBR and an eye specific driver (GMR-Gal4) XREF_BIBR and measured Src42A and Src64B transcript levels by quantitative realtime PCR in total larval and adult head extracts, respectively.
